name: empowerher-backend
description: Backend API for EmpowerHer - Gender-Based Violence Reporting Platform

scripts.kill-port: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { const output = execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :5000', { encoding: 'utf8' }); const pid = output.split(/\s+/)[4]; if (pid) { execSync(`taskkill /PID ${pid} /F`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('âœ“ Port 5000 freed'); } else { console.log('Port 5000 is already free'); } } catch(e) { console.log('Port 5000 is already free'); }"

author: EmpowerHer Team
